title: Berkeley Bowl Midcentury Cottage
posting_body: ['This beautiful standalone apartment is currently available.', ' The unit is standalone, which means there are no connected buildings around all four sides of the cottage.', ' It has midcentury details that give it a lot of character and huge tall windows in the east letting in lots of light.', ' The unit consists of two bedrooms, one bathroom, hardwood floors, a separated kitchen, and ample closet space.', " It's a very quiet apartment, and yet conveniently located in Berkeley.", ' Berkeley Bowl grocery is a stones throw away.', 'PROPERTY FEATURES:', '- Sunny open space floor plan', '- Separate kitchen with newer refrigerator, large gas stove and deep sink', '- Standalone building', '- Access to on-site laundry', '- In a tranquil garden setting', '- Utility includes water and garbage', '- This is a pet free and smoke free building', '- No subleasing and or assignments', '- Professionally managed', 'NEIGHBORHOOD:', '- Berkeley Bowl Grocery', '- Close to UC Berkeley campus', '- Close to downtown Berkeley', '- Walgreens, grocery stores, Sports Basement, cafes and restaurants are walkable', 'GETTING AROUND:', '- Close to transportation, buses, ZipCar, Getaround and BART', '- Walk to school, work, cafes, restaurants, grocery, and more.', '(walkscore = 92/100)', '- Bike on flat southside Berkeley (Bikescore = 100/100)', '- Bus: ACTransit run east west and north south.', '(12, 18, 49, F)', '- BART - Bay Area Rapid Transit Ashby station is a 5 minute walk away connecting you to the bay.', 'Lease Terms:', '- Rent: $2,998', '- Available now', '- One year lease', '- Application Fee: $45', '- Security Deposit: $2,000', '- No subleasing or assignments', 'Virtual Open House:  https://youtu.be/3aKctP0sMmU', 'Rental applications and screening fees are available online.', ' Please email if you have any questions or', "you'd like to come take a look.", 'Thank you for reading.']
